alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 11:14AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and southeastern Glynn Counties through 1145 AM EDT... At 1113 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Woodbine, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Jekyll Island, Sea Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden
